page.title: 13School Games in Guildford
page.content: In our playground we play a variety of games. Girls of about eight play clapping games while girls of twelve like to sit and chatter.Nine year olds play skipping games with rhymes like: {"I'm a little bumper car, { Number forty eight, { I whizz round the corner, { Stamp on the brakes, { Copper came and caught me, { Put me in jail, { All I drank was some bottles of ale, { How many bottles did I drink?" Boys play football and games that involve running such as Britsh Bulldog, although it is against the rules. We often have seasonal crazes such as marbles in spring, conkers in autumn and leapfrog. On the playground games like football,lines and "it" can be played all year round. We are lucky to have a very large play area.
